About our casino hotel

The award-winning luxury InterContinental Sydney Double Bay is located in the leafy eastern suburb of Double Bay. Luxurious suites and standard rooms will not leave you indifferent in our hotel. All rooms with a gorgeous view and a very good designer renovation, enjoy the luxury and space. Relax with a drink at the Upper Bar, visit the top casino ranked in Australia's top casinos. Relax in the stylish and iconic pool bar with breathtaking views of the harbour, a true Australian vibe and luxury. Enjoy a gourmet afternoon tea or an expertly crafted G&T in the evening before enjoying a chic multi-cuisine menu at the restaurant. Top 10 online casinos in Australia can move you into an atmosphere of excitement and unexpected prizes. Indulge in true luxury with our range of facilities, including the Trumps Spa and 24-hour gym, surrounded by high-end fashion boutiques, sidewalk cafes and harbor beaches.
